content.name: dishwasher
content.label: Dish Washer
content.gloss: a machine for washing dishes automatically

content.name: body
content.label: Body
content.gloss: the main body part for a dishwasher, excluding the base and cords, etc.

content.name: base
content.label: Base
content.gloss: the base support for the dishwasher

content.name: foot_base
content.label: Foot Base
content.gloss: the foot base for dishwasher that touchs the ground

content.name: surface_base
content.label: Surface Base
content.gloss: surface style base (or directly contacting with the ground)

content.name: accessories
content.label: Accessories
content.gloss: all accessories parts, including cord, etc.

content.name: body_interior
content.label: Body Interior
content.gloss: a set of components inside the dishwasher box, including shelf

content.name: door
content.label: Door
content.gloss: the dishwasher door which can be open and food can be put through the door

content.name: side_controls
content.label: Side Controls
content.gloss: a set of controls at the side of dishwasher, including buttons and display panels, etc.

content.name: cord
content.label: Cord
content.gloss: a cord or connector line that connects the dishwasher to power

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: a handle that people can use to pull open and off a door

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a short leg or foot at the very bottom of a dishwasher that touchs the ground

content.name: shelf
content.label: Shelf
content.gloss: a flat length of wood or rigid material, attached to a wall or forming part of a piece of furniture, that provides a surface for the storage or display of objects.

content.name: door_frame
content.label: Door Frame
content.gloss: the outside frame for the dishwasher door, usually made of plastic, etc.

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: control_button
content.label: Control Button
content.gloss: an individual control button that uses to set the time, mode for dishwasher

content.name: display_panel
content.label: Display Panel
content.gloss: a display planel on the dishwasher indicating the washing time

content.name: control_panel
content.label: Control Panel
content.gloss: a control planel on the dishwasher with many buttons, displays on it

content.name: indicator
content.label: Indicator
content.gloss: indicator of the status on the panel

content.name: frame
content.label: Frame
content.gloss: the exterior dishwasher box, excluding the interior trays, the outside door and dishwasher controls, etc.

content.name: surface
content.label: Surface
content.gloss: a big surface board

content.name: glass
content.label: Glass
content.gloss: a surface of glass

content.name: caster
content.label: Wheel Assembly
content.gloss: a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable

content.name: brake
content.label: Brake
content.gloss: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle

content.name: caster_yoke
content.label: Caster Yoke
content.gloss: forked part for connecting wheel to mounting plate

content.name: caster_stem
content.label: Caster Stem
content.gloss: post part of caster rig

content.name: caster_mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plate
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: wheel
content.label: Wheel
content.gloss: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)
